list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a solid or hollow spherical or egg-shaped object that is kicked, thrown, or hit in a game.
(in baseball) a pitch delivered outside the strike zone that the batter does not attempt to hit.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the umpire called it a ball
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: trọng tài gọi nó là một quả bóng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the rounded protuberant part of the foot at the base of the big toe.
a formal social gathering for dancing.
squeeze or form (something) into a rounded shape.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Robert balled up his napkin and threw it onto his plate
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Robert ball lên khăn ăn và ném nó lên đĩa của mình
